data.message: i do not like the bigger fonts, go back to the regular way. or is there a way i can change them back..

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Terri. Please provide more detail by reporting this to us here: http://bit.ly/2e4AIgh. Thanks again. -Hannah
Thanks for reaching out, Terri. If there's something you'd like to see on Facebook, please let us know here: on.fb.me/1N2bhYs -Hannah

Facebook Dear Facebook support, We are in shock that you are suspending our page. We are an independent team of reporters, with no political affiliations, who present the actual image in Palestine. And we are not aware of violating any of your rules, so we would like to request that you restore our page please. https://www.facebook.com/GNNA.News
Facebook ahhh so some people get replies but some dont cool

Facebook Dear Sir/Madam,
Find this road I would like to let you know that on 30/6/2016 a letter from our lawyer was sent to you. 
Date we have received no answer from your Office in Dutch. 
The letter I have sent along in the annex I hope as soon as possible a response from you.. read private chat
Facebook Hannah, I bought a Facebook Game Card and redeem page won't let me redeem it!!!!!!!!HELP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Thanks for letting us know. Please help us track these issues & submit the problem through our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2e7dfLJ. -Joe
Facebook why don't you report the problems to the help center-we don't work for Facebook, you do.
